description: Gardener's Pie, this one is made with sweet potato, and is quick and easy to assemble.
name: Gardeners Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 415g veggie delights casserole mince in gravy
425g lentils no added salt, drained and rinsed
50g no added salt tomato paste (triple concentrated )
2 tsp mixed herbs (eg herbs de provence or italian blend)
600g leftover sweet potato, mashed (or potato, or 1-2 sweet potatoes, peeled/chopped)
2 tsp yeast (or parmesan - non dairy or dairy, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook and mash the sweet potato or potato. For convenience I used a packet of ready-to-cook frozen mashed sweet potato, which I microwaved. You could peel, chop and steam 1-2 sweet potatoes (about 10 minutes in the microwave) and then mash them instead. Standard potato also works fine. Leftover mash works well for this dish (defrost it first, if frozen).
Add the drained lentils and frozen peas and stir to combine. Smooth the top with the spoon.
If desired, to make the top crispy, you can make ridges in the potato with a fork.
Optional extra - sprinkle the top with nutritional yeast, non-dairy parmesan cheese or (non-vegan option) grated parmesan cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until heated through and the mash is starting to get slightly brown and crispy.
Preheat the oven to 180Â°C and gather the ingredients.
In a baking/casserole dish, combine the vegie delights casserole mince with the tomato paste, herbs and pepper. Stir to combine. If desired you can use multiple small casserole dishes or ramekins.
Top with the cooked mashed sweet potato and smooth it out.
